channel.title: Change matrix room link
channel.description:
On: http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/
> Vibrant Community > > Forums > Telegram > Matrix > Newsletter > Contributors
change matrix room link from:
https://matrix.to/#/!ldUrkJMMqFScVZBdYN:tchncs.de?via=matrix.org&via=tchncs.de&via=privacytools.io
to:
https://matrix.to/#/#whonix:tchncs.de
Change need to be done to the footer as well.
